content.en: Smoking cessation algorithms: Researchers have explored various questions related to smoking cessation and the role of algorithms in healthcare. These questions include whether nurses can effectively manage smoking cessation clinics, what recommendations exist for treating tobacco use and dependence, and whether comprehensive smoking cessation programs are effective in routine primary care practice. The agencies responsible for these algorithms range from the Agency for Health Care Policy and Research to the Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality.
content.da: Rygestopalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige spørgsmål relateret til rygestop og algoritmers rolle i sundhedsvæsenet. Disse spørgsmål inkluderer, om sygeplejersker effektivt kan lede rygestopklinikker, hvilke anbefalinger der findes til behandling af tobaksmisbrug og afhængighed, og om omfattende rygestopprogrammer er effektive i rutinemæssig primærpleje. De ansvarlige agenturer for disse algoritmer spænder fra Agency for Health Care Policy and Research til Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality.
